snippet.title: Intellivision Advanced Dungeons & Dragons - Best Intellivision Games
snippet.description:
Intellivision Advanced Dungeons & Dragons - Best Intellivision Games. You can blaze a trail and read, watch, listen and play the history of the incredible Intellivision video game console at The Dot Eaters: https://thedoteaters.com/?bitstory=console/colecovision

The venerable paper-and-dice game D&D inspired countless video games and the designers who made them.  Intellivision Advanced Dungeons & Dragons Cartridge was the first video game officially licensed by TSR. It was also one of the best Intellivision games.

Facebook 🕹️ https://www.facebook.com/thedoteaters
Twitter 🕹️ https://twitter.com/doteaters
YouTube 🕹️ https://www.youtube.com/user/Umma6umma
Pinterest 🕹️ https://www.pinterest.com/thedoteaters/

-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-
View the goofy glitch that makes playing Access Software's classic game Leader Board Golf so much fun: 
https://youtu.be/HnEN942x5rY
-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-
